pr_title: Only show dashboard delete button for users with correct permissions

timeline.bodyText:
We need to execute the search, when page, perPage or query changes, this works perfectly in combination with useEffect, except for this case (deleting a view). As you can see in the diff, we are running execSearch  after setState.  With the current implementation, setPage(1) will not trigger executeSearch, when the current page is 1.
The above  execSearch(); in line 55 has no effect. also setPage(1).then() is not a possible solution.
Do you have any idea how to deal with this case?
timeline.author: linuspahl

timeline.message: Add more specific permissions check when displaying dashboard delete button
Only show dashboard actions menu for admins
Use hooks instead of class for ViewList
